Check if the game is over, means neither player can place a disc that captures discs of the opponent.

isValidMove(Move) - Method in class othello.model.game.OthelloGame
Check if a move is a valid move, which is at least one closest area has other Mark, And on this line, there is mark itself next to other Mark.
